TopicTitle: Sandbox tech-tree / bldg-upgrade filter to simulate career restrictions

Articles.Content:
I'll be posting this in KSP2 also but figured I'd throw it here also as a possible mod idea.

Sandbox tech-tree / bldg-upgrade filter to simulate career restrictions.  The idea being that you can be in a sandbox game, but restrict oneself to available parts and abilities at a certain progression level.  

This would allow one to  quickly "what if?" different craft building possibilities and alternate progression decisions in a separate save game
